Player History
Drafted in 33rd round, 391st overall pick, by New York in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Nathaniel More (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/24/2019, off Javier Sanchez (MIN)...
Injured on 4/28/2019 with a Fractured Hip, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 4/26/2020 to a minor league deal...
9/21/2020: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $2,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
Won Conference Championship with Houston in 2020...
